title: Electrical and thermal performance of bifacial photovoltaics under varying albedo conditions at temperate climate (UK)

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Aydan Garrod, Shanza Neda Hussain, Meet Hemantbhai Intwala, Amruthalakshmi Poudhar, S. Manikandan, Aritra Ghosh
